IDE-UI-001: Design and implement expandable swarm status panel in VSCode extension. Add expandable sections for pending tasks, in-progress tasks, completed tasks, and blocked tasks with click-to-expand functionality. Each section should show task count and expand to list individual tasks with details (ID, description, assigned role, priority).

IDE-QOL-001: Design and implement expandable swarm status panel in VSCode extension. Add expandable sections for pending tasks, in-progress tasks, completed tasks, and blocked tasks with click-to-expand functionality. Each section should show task count and expand to list individual tasks with details (ID, description, assigned role, priority). Include visual indicators and smooth expand/collapse animations.

IDE-UI-EXPANDABLE-001: Implement expandable swarm status panel in VSCode extension.
